WorkItem.Description:
The column header is not being displayed with the expected height by default. The issue corrects itself when a column has been resized by the user.
 
It seems to be the result of the following conditions:
AutoGenerateColumns="False" ColumnHeaderHeight="50" and rows existing within the result set (data bound). The situation is made worse by the SelectionMode="Single" attribute.
 
Test case attached.
WorkItem.Summary: DataGrid column header not obeying configured height

Comments.Message: We agree that this is bug and we logged it in our internal database.
